content.text:
# List of Guggenheim Fellowships awarded in 1933

Thirty-eight Guggenheim Fellowships were awarded in 1933. Arnold and Lucile Blanch were the first couple to both win a Guggenheim award in the same year.
1933 U.S. and Canadian Fellows
